info.author: Joel Lefkowitz
info.description:
# Visual Hanoi

Python implementation of the famous Towers of Hanoi problem. A Jupyter environment allows users to write and test solutions. Includes an angular webapp to visualize algorithms as they run.

## Status

| Source  | Shields  |
|-----|--------------|
| Project  | ![license][license] ![release][release]  |
| Publishers  | [![pypi][pypi]][pypi_link]    |
| Downloads  | ![pypi_downloads][pypi_downloads] |
| Raised  | [![issues][issues]][issues_link] [![pulls][pulls]][pulls_link]  |

[license]: https://img.shields.io/github/license/joellefkowitz/visual-hanoi

[release]: https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/joellefkowitz/visual-hanoi

[pypi]: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/visual-hanoi (PyPi)
[pypi_link]: https://pypi.org/project/visual-hanoi

[python_version]: https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/visual-hanoi

[pypi_downloads]: https://img.shields.io/pypi/dw/visual-hanoi

[issues]: https://img.shields.io/github/issues/joellefkowitz/visual-hanoi (Issues)
[issues_link]: https://github.com/JoelLefkowitz/visual-hanoi/issues

[pulls]: https://img.shields.io/github/issues-pr/joellefkowitz/visual-hanoi (Pull requests)
[pulls_link]: https://github.com/JoelLefkowitz/visual-hanoi/pulls  

## Motivation

Intended to be used as a teaching tool.

### Installing

Install from pypi:

```
pip install visual-hanoi
```

## Running the app

Under development
